text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701 Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz Pantone Validated FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB PCIe NVMe SSD Hyper Drive, Windows 10 Pro - GX701GX-XS76 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701 Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz Pantone Validated FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB PCIe NVMe SSD Hyper Drive, Windows 10 Pro - GX701GX-XS76!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701 Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz Pantone Validated FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB PCIe NVMe SSD Hyper Drive, Windows 10 Pro - GX701GX-XS76 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701 Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz Pantone Validated FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB PCIe NVMe SSD Hyper Drive, Windows 10 Pro - GX701GX-XS76!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus S GX701 Gaming Laptop, 17.3" 144 Hz Pantone Validated FHD IPS, GeForce RTX 2080, Intel Core i7-8750H CPU, 16 GB DDR4, 1 TB PCIe NVMe SSD Hyper Drive, Windows 10 Pro - GX701GX-XS76 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
